title: Jacob Rees-Mogg – 2022 Comments on Boris Johnson Returning as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jacob Rees-Mogg, the Secretary of State for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
I’m backing Boris [Johnson]. Boris or Bust.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
